short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elegant to-do list that's there when you need it. Quickly keep track of tasks and store valuable information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep all your thoughts in one place with this simple to-do list.

Ranked as “the greatest to-do list of all time” by Maxim Collingwood, MiniList is used by many people to organize every aspect of their professional and personal lives.

MiniList can be used to:
• Organize your day
• Stop procrastinating
• Brainstorm ideas
• Create goals
• Develop time management skills
• Balance your work and personal lives
• Remember important dates
• Budget for the week
• Improve grades
• And more!!!
